title: Omotta Ijou no Hannou
description:
1. Machiko's Such A Sweet Girl
- A "Virgin Killer" unwittingly gets set up with 3 virgins who take advantage of her.

2. Fu-chan Typhoon
- A horny girl invites her friend over to satisfy her "urges."

3-4. At Our House
- A mother and son have a very close relationship. His friend also gets involved.

5. Mai-neechan Is The Only One For Me
- A young man and his step-sister rekindle an old relationship.

6-7. Igarashi In Her Youth
- An inexperienced girl gets her classmates to fix that "problem." She later grows a penis and her teacher joins in.

8. I Wanna Be With Nodoka
- A successful novelist finds a guy jerking off in the park and helps him.

source: bakabt.me
